text: Hi, anyone knows why  when i register a customer by a registration form, they don't receive a password registration e-mail and when i try to do the registration  by the registration API, i can't register them .automatically to a list.

Hi Victor, can you expand on the following:
> i try to do the registration by the registration API
HubSpot does currently have an API for CMS Hubs Membership feature at the moment.
Can you send me the documentation url because i can't find url.
